ActorTalk: Commandant, I scanned the warehouse. Only one crate was tampered with.
The crate is full of spice containers. Some were broken, and spices are scattered all over.
Judging by the cuts, the tool used was sharp and had a wide bladeâ€”strong enough to pierce the alloy material.
The spices show signs of being burned by intense heat, but not evenly. Looks like the cutting tool also had a basic heating module.
That would mean the thief used...
That's right. From what I can tell, the weapon was probably military-grade.
Also, the staff at Ocean Heart's flagship store are all mechanoids. Their laser tools don't match the results we're seeing.
Since there are no other leads, let's narrow it down to humans and Constructs. We can check if anyone fits the profile.
Right. Surveillance was jammed during the theft, but we can pull footage from nearby and track movement.
But a laser gun wouldn't make such a clean cut.
...Ultrasonic? Based on my experience, sonic weapons can't cut through metal.
